brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of MK0928 for Insomnia in Adults (0928-003)(COMPLETED)
brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to study the safety and effectiveness of MK0928 for adults with insomnia.
intervention_name: MK0928, gaboxadol / Duration of Treatment - 1 year
Comparator: placebo / Duration of Treatment -1 year
